name: Campus Culture [Playtest]
description:
"Dear EMPLOYEE #1398, Welcome to your first day!"

It's your first day working at a bookstore. But not everything is quite what it seems. Collect books, clothes, and snacks as you work through each shift with your...interesting manager. 

Follow for more upcoming games:
